### Added
- Add `cluster.x-k8s.io/cluster-name` for `v1alpha3` CAPI CR's.
### Changed
- Default `clusterName` for `MachineDeployments` if empty.
### Fixed
- Fixed `infrastrutureRef` in /spec/template/spec for `MachineDeployments`.
